alert.note: Alert for Reno; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 08 at 8:16AM CDT until June 11 at 7:36AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Cow Creek near Hutchinson affecting Rice and Reno Counties. For the Cow Creek...including Lyons, Hutchinson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cow Creek near Hutchinson. * WHEN...From this evening to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, The low water crossing on Wilson Rd between 69th Ave to 82nd Ave floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 10.1 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 9.5 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Cow Creek Hutchinso 9.5 8.2 Wed 7 am CDT 9.9 10.1 7.6 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
